channel.title: OldSchoolRsc
channel.description:
Hey guys,
To begin with I have not done any of the programming for this server, only the Modifications.
The server is based on the old school RSC before the wilderness. I've used the old project p2p source and had it edited and modified.
- I have restricted the map - you can fight anyone +- 8 combats - draynor mannor is a completely open zone where you can fight anyone - fisherman gives trouts (you can buy salmon, tuna and lobs from the store) - Rune armour and addy plate isn't available in shops/r2h is 1mill. - There are no armour/weapon restrictions (you can wield addy and rune 2h at 1 attack etc.) - protect from missiles and protect items are disabled -- max stat is therefore 75 to stop people from doing too much damage with teams + rangers etc. - p2p mage is disabled - you can teleport between Draynor Village, Edgeville and Varrock.
I'm going to add some screenshots but just to let you know this server can only be played with hamachi (doesn't take long to dl and inshall) and you need to contact me so that I can make you an account (as its rscd). This server is kind of like BETA and is not going to be up 24/7, therefore I will set your stats to anything below 40 combat (only 40 range).
If anyone likes the idea and wishes to take over the project simply contact me. Irc.securitychat.org #OldSchoolRsc salrathor1@hotmail.com
Screenshots. Fighting near Lumb [img]http://upit.cc/images/fb5643cbff321b989170b0cf09383c12.bmp[/img]
Wield any item + can't fight in Lumbridge. [img]http://upit.cc/images/5873788c43d0815b01f93c658d178222.bmp[/img]
Fisherman in lumbridge (free trouts) [img]http://upit.cc/images/abf7d4caed767d13b7a463d45b8d3371.bmp[/img]
Lumbridge General Store. [img]http://upit.cc/images/1f61da2d472609d3b8fec6e494be95cc.bmp[/img]
Varrock General Store [img]http://upit.cc/images/a9d1c2db8be7ca4077d14ee149a55547.bmp[/img]
Edge General store [img]http://upit.cc/images/b44a03bf8bcaf151c2fe3d419bc97868.bmp[/img]
Teleporter [img]http://upit.cc/images/f25c7db50b14d9d6ea9a8b3419761bd3.bmp[/img]

item.title: OldSchoolRsc
item.dc:creator: @salrathor1 salrathor1
item.description:
@salrathor1 wrote:

Landscape is pretty much the same.

I’ve put barriers to disable access to falador, al kharid and wilderness. Other than that it is pretty much RSC with a few editions. For example, I have modified the dungeon in draynor mannor.

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchoolRsc
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“salrathor1, post:29, topic:278472”]Hey Ecko,

I’ve actually been asking for a server like this for a while but no-one was willing to do. I was just happy when I found other people wanting a similar server.

But as someone already said… it doesn’t really matter where the idea came from, its about making a server that people will enjoy… away from all the politics and dissing which seems to be happening around the RSC community these days.[/quote]
Yeah, I know. That’s why I said ‘No’ when you asked me on IRC if I wanted credit for this. Being credited with an idea hardly means shit.

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchoolRsc
item.dc:creator: @playerAction playerAction
item.description:
@playerAction wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:25, topic:278472”][quote author=playerAction link=topic=367543.msg2785074#msg2785074 date=1242443830]

Cool idea. Where’d you get it from?

It was his idea… he’s the same guy who suggested making the entire landscape “attackable”, on EpicPK forums.
[/quote]

He actually got it from when I said the only server worth playing would be one like RSC was before the wilderness.[/quote]

Oh, I didn’t know about that

Who knows, though? We could both be right… both of those factors could have influenced the creation of this server.

Read full topic
